sense.def:
To be licensed to do something
pomeni imeti uradno dovoljenje vlade ali kakšnih drugih oblasti, da smemo nekaj storiti.

seg.quote: These men are licensed to carry firearms.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj, kar imamo v lasti ali uporabljamo,
licensed
, imamo uradno dovoljenje za tisto.

seg.quote: The car is licensed and insured.

sense.def:
Kadar je neka restavracija ali hotel
licensed
, smejo tam prodajali alkoholne pijače.
